section.p: You can explicitly start a billing run for calculating the customer billing data for a billing period. The billing period for which the data is generated depends on the day when you start the billing run and on the TIMER_INTERVAL_BILLING_OFFSET configuration setting.
If you start a billing run on the first day of a month plus the day(s) defined in the TIMER_INTERVAL_BILLING_OFFSET setting, the revenue share data is also calculated and stored.

In the administration portal, choose Execute billing tasks in the Operation menu, and click Execute in the respective section of the Web page. For detailed step-by-step instructions, refer to the online help.
